name: Menemen
preparation: Heat olive oil in a pan.
Add chopped onions and green peppers, sauté until soft.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they release juice.
Crack eggs into the mixture and stir gently.
Cook until eggs are just set, season with salt and black pepper.
Serve hot with bread.

name: Lahmacun
preparation: Prepare dough with flour, water, yeast.
Mix ground meat with onions, parsley, tomato paste, red pepper flakes, salt.
Roll dough thin, spread meat mixture on top.
Bake in hot oven until crispy.
Serve with lemon and parsley.

name: İmam Bayıldı
preparation: Slice eggplants, scoop out a little flesh.
Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil.
Add chopped tomatoes, sugar, salt, black pepper.
Fill eggplants with mixture, bake until tender.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

name: Kısır
preparation: Soak bulgur in hot water.
Mix with tomato paste, red pepper paste, olive oil.
Add parsley, green onions, mint.
Season with salt, pepper, lemon juice.
Add pomegranate molasses.
Serve cold.

name: Baklava
preparation: Layer phyllo sheets, brush with butter.
Sprinkle nuts between layers.
Repeat until done, cut into diamond shapes.
Bake until golden.
Prepare syrup with sugar, water, lemon, honey.
Pour syrup over baklava.
Serve at room temperature.
